Class Portfolio

extends Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Portfolio

        public Portfolio()
        This is the main constructor. It creates an empty portfolio.

      • Portfolio

        public Portfolio(File file)
        This method constructs a portfolio of stocks. This is used for testing as the main software takes the file name from a call to the reader.
        Parameters:
        file - - takes the file to be read.

    • Method Detail

      • getContents

        public ArrayList<Stock> getContents()

      • getTotalValue

        public double getTotalValue()

      • setContents

        public void setContents(ArrayList<Stock> contents)

      • setTotalValue

        public void setTotalValue(double totalValue)

      • add

        public void add(Stock s)
        Similar to ArrayList<>.add, this method just adds a stock to the list of stocks.
        Parameters:
        s - - this is the stock, passed from the csv after being created.

      • portfolioReader

        public void portfolioReader(String fileName)
        PortfolioReader reads a file from a csv and creates a portfolio based on it. The format of the CSV file should be 'ticker,number of shares' for each line.s
        Parameters:
        fileName - this is the name of the file that will be read.

      • getSingleValue

        public Double getSingleValue()
        This gets the most recent historical value of a stock to take as the current value. It then adds all of the values together to get the total portfolio value for 1 of each.
        Returns:
        - returns the value of 1 of each stock as a cumulative total
